properties.areaDesc: Waters from Intracoastal City to Cameron LA from 20 to 60 NM; Waters from Cameron LA to High Island TX from 20 to 60 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 3 at 3:49PM CST until February 4 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles LA
properties.description:
* WHAT...South winds 20 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and seas 5 to 8
feet expected.

* WHERE...Waters from Cameron LA to High Island TX from 20 to 60
NM and Waters from Intracoastal City to Cameron LA from 20 to
60 NM.

* WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 AM CST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 AM CST TUESDAY
